attributes.action: Retain the compulsory wearing of masks.
attributes.additional_details:
The wearing of a face covering protects others...NOT the wearer.  To make the wearing of a mask an individual choice removes the ability to protect oneself from others.

How do I CHOOSE to protect myself?
attributes.background:
The government should review its decision to remove the compulsory wearing of face coverings as a means to reduce the spread of Covid.

Wearing a mask protects others and not the mask wearer.

Leaving the choice up to individuals creates anarchy.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
